A Public Domain SIP Signaling stack that works under J2ME/MIDP 2.0 and implements the JSR 180.

This project uses a scaled down version of JAIN-SIP ported to J2ME by the NIST.




Currently, this project is proudly sponsored and maintained by Genaker.

Thanks to their contribution, the stack has been fixed, adapted and thoroughly tested to work on real devices and against many SIP and IMS deployments.
